statements: SELECT * FROM car_accidents WHERE accident_id = 1;
SELECT car_model, repair_cost FROM car_accidents WHERE repair_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT accident_location, car_model FROM car_accidents WHERE repair_cost > 5000;
SELECT * FROM car_accidents ORDER BY accident_date DESC;
SELECT car_model, repair_date FROM car_accidents WHERE accident_location LIKE '%highway%';
SELECT car_model, accident_date FROM car_accidents WHERE repair_cost > 5000 ORDER BY accident_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM car_accidents WHERE car_model IN ('Toyota', 'Honda', 'Ford')
SELECT accident_id, car_model, repair_cost FROM car_accidents WHERE repair_date IS NOT NULL
SELECT MAX(repair_cost) AS max_repair_cost FROM car_accidents WHERE accident_location = 'Los Angeles'
SELECT car_model, accident_date, repair_cost FROM car_accidents ORDER BY repair_cost DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM car_accidents
SELECT location, accident_date, driver_id FROM car_accidents
SELECT * FROM repairs
SELECT repair_date, repair_cost FROM repairs
SELECT mechanic_name, repair_cost, accident_id FROM repairs
SELECT * FROM car_accidents ORDER BY accident_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT location, damage_cost FROM car_accidents WHERE damage_cost > 5000 ORDER BY damage_cost DESC
SELECT c.accident_id, r.repair_date, r.repair_cost, r.mechanic_name FROM car_accidents c JOIN repairs r ON c.accident_id = r.accident_id WHERE r.repair_cost > 1000 ORDER BY r.repair_cost DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT c.driver_id, COUNT(*) AS num_accidents FROM car_accidents c GROUP BY c.driver_id ORDER BY num_accidents DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT c.accident_id, c.location, r.repair_date, r.mechanic_name FROM car_accidents c LEFT JOIN repairs r ON c.accident_id = r.accident_id ORDER BY c.accident_date DESC, r.repair_date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM car_accidents;
SELECT accident_id, accident_date, accident_location FROM car_accidents;
SELECT MAX(accident_date) AS latest_accident_date FROM car_accidents;
SELECT car_license_plate, COUNT(*) AS num_accidents FROM car_accidents GROUP BY car_license_plate;
SELECT * FROM car_repairs WHERE repair_cost > 1000;
SELECT * FROM car_accidents ORDER BY accident_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT car_license_plate, accident_date, accident_location FROM car_accidents WHERE accident_cause='Collision' ORDER BY accident_date ASC;

SELECT c.accident_id, c.accident_date, r.repair_cost, i.claim_amount FROM car_accidents c JOIN car_repairs r ON c.accident_id = r.accident_id JOIN insurance_claims i ON r.repair_id = i.repair_id WHERE i.claim_status='Approved';
SELECT AVG(repair_cost) AS average_repair_cost, MAX(repair_cost) AS max_repair_cost FROM car_repairs;

SELECT car_license_plate, MAX(claim_amount) AS max_claim_amount FROM car_accidents JOIN car_repairs ON car_accidents.accident_id = car_repairs.accident_id JOIN insurance_claims ON car_repairs.repair_id = insurance_claims.repair_id GROUP BY car_license_plate;
SELECT * FROM car_accidents;
SELECT accident_id, location FROM car_accidents WHERE damage_amount > 5000;
SELECT accident_date, location FROM car_accidents ORDER BY accident_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM repair_history WHERE repair_cost < 1000;
SELECT shop_name, location FROM repair_shop;
SELECT * FROM car_accidents
SELECT * FROM car_accidents ORDER BY accident_date DESC
SELECT accident_id, location FROM car_accidents WHERE location='New York'
SELECT repair_date, repair_cost FROM repair_history WHERE repair_cost > 1000
SELECT shop_name, location FROM repair_shop
SELECT * FROM accidents;
SELECT accident_id, date, location FROM accidents ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT make, model, year FROM vehicles WHERE year > 2015;
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, claim_amount FROM insurance_claims WHERE claim_amount > 5000;
SELECT driver_id, name, license_number FROM drivers ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM accidents
SELECT description, location FROM accidents WHERE date = '2022-01-15'
SELECT make, model, year FROM vehicles WHERE make = 'Toyota'
SELECT name, license_number FROM drivers
SELECT claim_date, claim_amount FROM insurance_claims ORDER BY claim_date DESC
